title: Twitter down, social network suffers outage as users unable to access timelines

title: Scientists aim to create AI from human brain cells: ‘New frontier’

title: AirPods maker pressured to speed exit from China amid Beijing-US tensions: report
textBody: <![CDATA[The China-based maker of Apple's AirPods is reportedly facing pressure from US tech companies to find new manufacturing locations outside the country amid rising tensions between Beijing and Washington.]]>

title: Elon Musk looks to develop AI rival to ‘woke’ ChatGPT: report
textBody: <![CDATA[In a recent tweet, Musk lamented that OpenAI was "training AI to be woke."]]>

title: White House gives agencies 30 days to impose federal device TikTok ban
textBody: <![CDATA[The White House on Monday ordered government agencies to rid their devices of the Chinese-owned app TikTok within 30 days in an effort to prevent China’s communist government from spying on the US.]]>
source: Latest Technology News and Product Reviews | New York Post

title: Google employee Jacob Pratt, 33, found dead of apparent suicide in NYC apartment

title: Peter Thiel’s Palantir cuts around 2% of its workforce

title: Chinese ‘kissing’ device with ‘real-life silicon lips’ panned as creepy: ‘Where’s the tongue?’
textBody: <![CDATA[The lips are designed to simulate the pressure, movement, and heat of a lover's lips using sensors -- giving users' a real-life smooching experience.]]>

title: Elon Musk tweets ‘hope you had a good Sunday’ as 200 Twitter employees fired

title: Esther Crawford, Twitter exec who slept in office overnight, is fired: report
textBody: <![CDATA[Esther Crawford was a holdover from the old regime who reportedly gained Musk's trust and elbowed her way into the reclusive mogul's inner circle.]]>

title: Last-minute problem keeps SpaceX rocket, astronauts grounded
textBody: <![CDATA[SpaceX did not immediately say when it would try again. The next attempt could come as early as Tuesday, although poor weather was forecast up the East Coast in the emergency recovery area.]]>

title: Elon Musk lays off at least 50 more Twitter employees, including senior staff: report
textBody: <![CDATA["Waking up to find I’ve been locked out of my email. Looks like I’m let go. Now my Revue journey is really over," de Kuijper tweeted early Sunday.]]>

title: Colombia court moves to metaverse, hosts first hearing
textBody: <![CDATA[At the two-hour hearing held by Colombia's Magdalena Administrative court, participants in a traffic dispute appeared as avatars in a virtual courtroom.]]>
source: Latest Technology News and Product Reviews | New York Post
